description: CLI 命令注册表 - 顶层命令描述

replacements.description: \"Initialize local config a: description: "初始化本地配置和代理工作区"
replacements.description: \"Interactive onboarding wi: description: "网关、工作区和技能的交互式引导向导"
replacements.description: \"Search and reindex memory: description: "搜索和重建记忆文件索引"
replacements.description: \"Run one agent turn via th: description: "通过网关运行一次代理"
replacements.description: \"Manage isolated agents (w: description: "管理隔离的代理（工作区、认证、路由）"
replacements.description: \"Show channel health and r: description: "显示渠道健康状态和最近会话接收者"
replacements.description: \"Fetch health from the run: description: "从运行中的网关获取健康状态"
replacements.description: \"List stored conversation: description: "列出已存储的对话会话"
replacements.description: \"Manage OpenClaw's dedicat: description: "管理 OpenClaw 专用浏览器（Chrome/Chromium）"
